mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user( username, password, salt, gender, phone, email, avater, is_delete, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avater}, #{isDelete}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, salt, avater, is_delete isDelete FROM t_user WHERE username=#{username}
